channel.title: ~.Mayhempkers.~
channel.description:
[b][center]Mayhem pkers will be a Good pking server, while you can skill too, The base WILL be *ddsspeced* to prove delta can be turned into something good, the clients base will be bluurs, since it is by far one of the best clients out there.[/center][/b]
[b][left]NOTE[/left][/b]
[b][center]I am ALWAYS open to suggestions on what i should do next.[/center][/b]
[center]I will be making this server as i learn java, and eventualy i will host it.[/center] [center]What im planning to do.[/center] [center]Make a fully functional d claws spec, still working on it.[/center] [center]Make Perfect mage with the right timers, etc.[/center] [center]Make this server fun for everyone who plays it.[/center]
[center]Credits[/center] Bluur-client base. Zee best-Lunar interface. Jayden-Server base. xx qwertyuiop xx-without him helping me with the error i had i wouldnt have most of the stuff in the client. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [center][b]Pics.[/b][/center] Ags special, i fixed it up a bit, it now hits well and theres a new emote for it. [IMG]http://i353.photobucket.com/albums/r364/15062isaac15062/ags.jpg[/img] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ D claws spec, still working on it. [IMG]http://i353.photobucket.com/albums/r364/15062isaac15062/clawage.jpg[/img] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DFS Fix. [IMG]http://i353.photobucket.com/albums/r364/15062isaac15062/dfsfix.jpg[/img] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Some new items. [IMG]http://i353.photobucket.com/albums/r364/15062isaac15062/newitems.jpg[/img] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Vengeance skull and lunar, 100% credits to zee best for the lunar. [IMG]http://i353.photobucket.com/albums/r364/15062isaac15062/roflcopter.jpg[/img] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ill update this later =) Feel free to comment.
